clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of Medical Clowns and Topical Anesthetic Cream on Pain and Anxiety in Children Undergoing Allergy Skin Tests

brief_summary.textblock: Allergy skin tests are occasionally associated with pain and anxiety in patients undergoing this procedure. The investigators intend to examine if medical clowns compared with local anesthetic cream can decrease these feelings in children.

primary_outcome.measure: The level of anxiety experienced by children undergoing allergy skin tests and receiving application of local anesthetic cream and/or care and treatment from medical clowns

secondary_outcome.measure: Severity of pain experienced by these children

arm_group.arm_group_label: Placebo cream, Skin test, Anxiety, Pain
arm_group.description: After placing a placebo cream on both arms, pain and anxiety resulting from performing allergy skin test on one of the arms will be evaluated

arm_group.arm_group_label: Anesthetic cream, pain and anxiety, skin test
arm_group.description: After placing a placebo cream on one arm and anesthetic cream on the second arm, pain and anxiety resulting from performing allergy skin test on the second arm will be evaluated

arm_group.arm_group_label: Medical clown, placebo cream, skin test
arm_group.description: After placing a placebo cream on both arms and after receiving care and treatment from a medical clown, pain and anxiety resulting from performing allergy skin test on one of the arms will be evaluated

arm_group.arm_group_label: Medical clown, Anesthetic cream, Skin test
arm_group.description: After placing a placebo cream on one arm and anesthetic cream on the second arm and after receiving care and treatment from a medical clown, pain and anxiety resulting from performing allergy skin test on the second arm will be evaluated

intervention.description: The cream will be applied on the volar aspect of both arms for 1 hour
intervention.arm_group_label: Placebo cream, Skin test, Anxiety, Pain

intervention.arm_group_label: Anesthetic cream, pain and anxiety, skin test

intervention.intervention_name: Care and treatment from a medical clown
intervention.description: Medical clown will entertain the children before, during and after performing the skin test. Placebo cream will be applied on both arms.
intervention.arm_group_label: Medical clown, placebo cream, skin test

intervention.intervention_name: Care and treatment from a medical clown
intervention.description: Medical clown will entertain the children, placebo cream will be applied on one arm and anesthetic cream on the second arm
intervention.arm_group_label: Medical clown, Anesthetic cream, Skin test

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Any child undergoing allergy prick skin test
Exclusion Criteria:
- Children suffering from coulrophobia (phobia of clowns)
- Children with a known hypersensitivity to EMLA 5% cream
- Children who have undergone a painful medical procedure (surgery, dental procedures, blood drawing) over the past 3 months
- Children who, for medical reasons, must have their skin test performed on an area other than the volar aspect of the arm
